pages.text: 7|105|‘Eta sthira niscita ye, ami allaha sambandhe satya chara balaba na. Tomadera rabera kacha theke spasta pramana niye ami tomadera kache esechi, kaje'i bani isara'ilake tumi amara sathe pathiye da'o [1].’
7|106|Phira’a'una balala, ‘yadi tumi kono nidarsana ene thaka, tabe tumi satyabadi hale ta pesa kara.’
7|107|Atahpara musa tamra hatera lathi niksepa karalena ebam sathe sathe'i ta eka ajagara sape parinata hala [1].
7|108|Ebam tini tamra hata bera karalena [1] ara sathe sathe'i ta darsakadera kache subhra ujjbala dekhate lagala [2].
7|109|Phira’a'una sampradayera netara balala, ‘e to ekajana sudaksa jadukara [1],’
7|110|‘e tomaderake tomadera desa theke bera kare dite caya, ekhana tomara ki paramarsa da'o [1]?’
7|111|Tara balala, ‘take o tara bha'ike kichu abakasa da'o ebam nagare nagare sangrahakaderake patha'o [1],’
7|112|‘Yena tara tomara kache pratiti sudaksa jadukara upasthita kare.’
7|113|Jadukarara phira’a'unera kache ese balala, ‘amara yadi bijayi ha'i tabe amadera jan'ya puraskara thakabe to [1]?’
7|114|Se balala, hyam ebam tomara abasya'i amara ghanisthadera antarbhukta habe.’
7|115|Tara balala, ‘he musa! Tumi'i ki niksepa karabe, na amara'i niksepa karaba [1]?’
7|116|Tini balalena, ‘tomara'i niksepa kara’. Yakhana tara niksepa karala, takhana tara lokadera cokhe jadu karala, taderake atankita karala ebam tara eka bara rakamera jadu niye ela [1].
7|117|Ara amara musara kache ohi pathalama ye, ‘apani apanara lathi niksepa karuna' [1]. Sathe sathe seta tara ye alika bastu baniyechila ta gile phelate lagala
7|118|phale satya pratisthita hala ebam tara ya karachila ta batila haye gela.
7|119|Sutaram sekhane tara parabhuta hala o lanchita haye phire gela
